verbose_text: DRG neurons were treated with two different concentrations of CytoD for 20 minutes to induce actin disassembly, followed by a 30 minutes recovery period in the presence of control medium or Wnt3a, during which F-actin would be re-assembled (XREF_FIG).
evidence: DRG neurons were treated with two different concentrations of CytoD for 20 minutes to induce actin
